    • Method Detail

      • createProject

        public boolean createProject(File projectParentDir,
                             Project project,
                             String packagePrefix,
                             String reactorParentMavenVersion,
                             String topmostParentMavenVersion)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                             IllegalStateException
        Creates a new Project using the information found within the supplied projectDefinition.
        Specified by:
        createProject in interface ProjectFactory
        Parameters:
        projectParentDir - a directory in which the project should be created.
        project - The entity defining the Project's overall data, and holding naming standards.
        packagePrefix - A non-null (but optionally empty) package prefix prepended to the groupId of the reactor parent POM. Typically the reverse DNS of the organisation creating the project, such as se.jguru. (For example, the groupId of the topmost reactor POM created within the projectParentDir is [packagePrefix].[name]).
        reactorParentMavenVersion - The non-empty Maven project version of reactor POMs within the project. Should be identical to the version of the reactor parent POM.
        topmostParentMavenVersion - The non-empty Maven project version of parent POMs within the project (and, normally, the version of all leaf projects within the Maven project reactor). Should be identical to the version of the parent parent POM.
        Returns:
        true if the project could be properly created, and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if projectParentDir was not an existing directory.
        IllegalStateException - if the projectRootDirectory (typically either on the form prefix-name or name) could not be created under the projectParentDir.

      • createProjectDefinition

        public Project createProjectDefinition(String prefix,
                                       String name,
                                       SimpleArtifact reactorParent,
                                       SimpleArtifact parentParent)
        Creates a Project (definition) by harvesting names from the supplied name, prefix and parent Artifact definitions.
        Specified by:
        createProjectDefinition in interface ProjectFactory
        Parameters:
        prefix - The project prefix. Optional, but recommended.
        name - The project name.
        reactorParent - The parent of the root reactor POM.
        parentParent - The parent of the topmost parent POM.
        Returns:
        A Project instance for use with the createProject method.

      • getSkeletonPomDirectoryName

        protected String getSkeletonPomDirectoryName(String projectName,
                                             PomType aPomType,
                                             String projectPrefix)
        Synthesizes the directory name from the supplied Project and PomType. The resulting name should adhere to the NamingStrategy's NamingStrategy.isPrefixRequiredOnAllFolders() property.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the active project.
        projectPrefix - The optional prefix of the active project. Must be supplied (and non-empty) if the NamingStrategy requires prefixes to be present on all folders' names.
        aPomType - The PomType for which a directory name should be synthesized.
        Returns:
        The name of the directory.
